data.text: @Glorthoron @CTVNews Thank you for the conversation! I just want everyone to be safe, happy, free and enjoy the true blessings of life.💖 ps I love Groot. Guardians of The Galaxy is one of my favs. My fave is Rocket though 🦝 🚀

@jastro321 @CTVNews Here's a report on one of the sites sharing this document:

https://t.co/Ll1oX7Z0uP

@Glorthoron @CTVNews This credit score system is already happening in China. I don’t want to believe it will happen in my country or all over the world. But we shouldn’t abandon and think everything is conspiracy. We should be aware and understand why this is being talked about. I’m just asking Q’s.
@jastro321 @CTVNews If you buy into this conspiracy theory nonsense, you should really take some time to reevaluate your line of thinking.

@jastro321 @CTVNews Who said anything about the brain shrinking. This article is about damage to the brain.

If it is true that the brain is shrinking, which I highly doubt, I am neither a virologist, neurologist, nor neurobiologist, so I am not qualified to make that determination.
@Glorthoron @CTVNews Also Not everyone wants this to happen. This isn’t the full document it won’t allow me to share the pdf. 💖 https://t.co/1cmK3z0Li1
@Glorthoron @CTVNews Can I ask you something though? Why do you think the brain is shrinking?
@Glorthoron @CTVNews I am not a doctor but have worked in medicine and with doctors since 2012. Anyways this argument is pointless. We both know that.

@Glorthoron @CTVNews I’m not saying vaccines don’t work. I’m just viewing it from a birds i perspective. Health is  bio individual what works for one doesn’t work for another. Sending love light and blessings to u!!!!!💖🦋🙏
